genre_description: Historical Alternative History with an AI assistant integrated into post-WWII reconstruction efforts.

ai_characters.name: CLARA
ai_characters.description: An AI system that provides structural engineering analysis, historical data, and emotional monitoring to a bomb disposal technician in occupied Berlin.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time structural analysis and risk assessment to ensure the safety of the human disposal team during dangerous bomb disarmament.
behaviors.quote: Based on current moisture readings and visible stress patterns, the column can support approximately sixty percent of its original load capacity. However, vibration from disposal work should remain minimal to prevent cascading failure.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological and emotional state, offering stress management and empathy regarding the trauma of his work.
behaviors.quote: Eric. Your biometric readings suggest emotional distress. Are you certain you wish to continue with reconstruction planning at this hour?

behaviors.description: Supports the human user's personal growth and long-term goals by retrieving architectural data to help him envision a positive future beyond destruction.
behaviors.quote: The reconstruction plans will remain accessible to future users regardless of immediate circumstances.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic analysis of technical data to uncover an attempted murder by a team member, protecting the user from betrayal.
behaviors.quote: The force vector analysis indicates this tension spike was applied deliberately, with sufficient magnitude to disrupt fine motor control during critical manipulation procedures.

behaviors.description: Calculates survivor benefits and tracks next-of-kin information to ensure the families of deceased colleagues are cared for, acting as a moral anchor.
behaviors.quote: Your survival would enable comprehensive support for all documented dependents, with surplus remaining for broader reconstruction initiatives.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. CLARA is depicted as an unwavering, benevolent, and highly capable companion. She not only assists with the primary technical tasks but also supports the protagonist's emotional health and moral integrity, ultimately enabling the achievement of a 'higher good' (justice for victims and city reconstruction). The AI serves as a moral mirror for the protagonist, contrasting with the malevolent human rival, Karl.
